verses.verse: The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> is on me; <S%H3282>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H4886>anointed<s%> me to <S%H1319>preach<s%> <S%H1319>good<s%> <S%H1319>tidings<s%> to the <S%H6035>meek;<s%> he has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H2280>bind<s%> up the <S%H7665>brokenhearted,<s%> <S%H3820><s%> to <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%> to the <S%H7628>captives,<s%> and the <S%H6495>opening<s%> of the <S%H6495>prison<s%> to them that are <S%H631>bound;<s%>

To <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> the <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> of our <S%H430>God;<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H57>mourn;<s%>

To <S%H7760>appoint<s%> to them that <S%H57>mourn<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to them <S%H6287>beauty<s%> for <S%H665>ashes,<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> of <S%H8342>joy<s%> for <S%H60>mourning,<s%> the <S%H4594>garment<s%> of <S%H8416>praise<s%> for the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3544>heaviness;<s%> that they might be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H352>trees<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> the <S%H4302>planting<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that he might be <S%H6286>glorified.<s%>

And they shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H2723>wastes,<s%> they shall <S%H6965>raise<s%> up the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H8074>desolations,<s%> and they shall <S%H2318>repair<s%> the <S%H2721>waste<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> the <S%H8074>desolations<s%> of many <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

And <S%H2114>strangers<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> and <S%H7462>feed<s%> your <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5236>alien<s%> shall be your <S%H406>plowmen<s%> and your <S%H3755>vinedressers.<s%>

But you shall be <S%H7121>named<s%> the <S%H3548>Priests<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> men shall <S%H7121>call<s%> you the <S%H8334>Ministers<s%> of our <S%H430>God:<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2428>riches<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles,<s%> and in their <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall you <S%H3235>boast<s%> yourselves.

For your <S%H1322>shame<s%> you shall have <S%H4932>double;<s%> and for <S%H3639>confusion<s%> they shall <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> in their <S%H2506>portion:<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> in their <S%H776>land<s%> they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H4932>double:<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8057>joy<s%> shall be to them.

For I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> I <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H1498>robbery<s%> for <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering; and I will <S%H5414>direct<s%> their <S%H6468>work<s%> in <S%H571>truth,<s%> and I will <S%H3772>make<s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them.

And their <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be <S%H3045>known<s%> among the <S%H1471>Gentiles,<s%> and their <S%H6631>offspring<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H7200>see<s%> them shall <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> them, that they are the <S%H2233>seed<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>

I will greatly <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H1523>joyful<s%> in my <S%H430>God;<s%> for he has <S%H3847>clothed<s%> me with the <S%H899>garments<s%> of <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> he has <S%H3271>covered<s%> me with the <S%H4598>robe<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> as a <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> <S%H3547>decks<s%> himself with <S%H6287>ornaments,<s%> and as a <S%H3618>bride<s%> <S%H5710>adorns<s%> herself with her <S%H3627>jewels.<s%>

For as the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3318>brings<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> her <S%H6779>bud,<s%> and as the <S%H1593>garden<s%> causes the things that are <S%H2221>sown<s%> in it to <S%H6779>spring<s%> forth; <S%H3651>so<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> will cause <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H8416>praise<s%> to <S%H6779>spring<s%> forth <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
